name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It was reported online that the reason for the large-scale train delays at Nanjing South Railway Station on October 27 was a serious accident.
After the first train hit a foreign object, the mechanic got off the train to check, but was hit by the second train and died. The body was not found. Later, the body of the 25-year-old mechanic of the first train was found on the third train.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 28, Zhongshan North Road, Hangzhou. A man cosplaying as "Pinru" was taken away by the police and was not allowed to leave until his friend brought him clothes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 28, a closure notice of Shanghai Zhongshan Park was posted inside the Australian National University.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 28, Shenyang. The faculty and staff of Northeastern University collectively held banners demanding that the school provide living allowances.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of October 27, the property management of Qifu New Village in Panyu, Guangzhou, raised the parking fee from 400 yuan to 880 yuan a month. Seeing that the owners did not cooperate, they also set up a large number of stone piers in the parking spaces and on the road to block the road. That night, a large number of owners protested.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of October 28, at Zhongshan North Road in Hangzhou, a recording of the police shouting as they dispersed the Halloween crowd

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 28, Harbin, Heilongjiang. Sima Nan was dining at a local restaurant when he met a woman who greeted him and started chatting with her. However, at the end of the video, the woman said to Sima Nan: I have heard of your reputation for being knowledgeable.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 28, Shanghai. A man was questioned by the police while walking on the street late at night holding a signboard of "Huaihai Middle Road".
Netizens responded: "Awesome, the most brutal Halloween I have seen so far"
The video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 29, in Chengdu, Sichuan, a man was reported online for stabbing an intermediary with a knife in an Internet cafe because he did not agree with the salary paid by a labor service company, and then tried to commit suicide by slitting his throat.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 28, Sanlian Weekly published an article saying, let's talk about this: What conditions do you need to meet to get married and have children?
Netizens responded: "Two days off a week, a monthly salary of more than 20,000 yuan, and no need to worry about being fired at the age of 35"
"Food safety standards are met, and education is free"
"I won't have children even if that condition is met"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 28 (Release) Netizens asked Doubao AI, a subsidiary of ByteDance, to generate a photo of "Winnie the Pooh carrying 100kg of wheat", but the AI replied that it could not generate the image. However, after removing the three words "Winnie the Pooh", the image was generated.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to South Korean media reports, Chinese fishing boats fishing in waters near North Korea have been frequently intercepted by the North Korean Coast Guard.
At the beginning of last month, a crab fishing boat was intercepted by North Korea. After paying a fine of 500,000 yuan, the other party released 6 crew members. The North Korean Coast Guard will take out a Chinese account and ask the fishermen to remit the fine. Due to the depletion of fishing resources in Chinese waters, fishing boats will enter North Korean waters to fish. Once caught, each boat will pay at least 350,000 yuan in fines.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/p4fPCE7TbV

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 28, Mianyang, Sichuan. An engineering project leader named Pu Xiaojiang was exposed online for asking employees in the work group to "focus on project work" and "let the stink first if someone dies at home"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 28, an auntie's tricycle for collecting waste was locked by a security guard. She knelt down and cried bitterly to the security guard.
October 28 (Release) A man was fined by the urban management for setting up a stall on the roadside. The collapsed man knelt down and kowtowed to the urban management, begging the urban management not to fine him.
October 24, Shanghai. Zhongrong Trust collapsed and could not repay. Investors knelt down to the leaders.
October 28 (Release) Zhaotong, Jiangsu. Owners of unfinished buildings knelt outside the government building to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A group of North Korean defectors have offered to join the Ukrainian armed forces to fight against North Koreans now fighting for Russia, and they are prepared to use their expertise in information and psychological warfare to influence North Korean soldiers stationed in Russia, the South China Morning Post reported.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 29, the Halloween event at Nanjing Mixc was cancelled. Nanjing Aqua City announced that gatherings were prohibited during Halloween.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 28, Russia Today RT reported that: According to the rating of "U.S. News and World Report", the Russian army is recognized as the most powerful army in the world, and the Ukrainian army is only ranked eighth.
Netizens responded: "They have fallen to the point of begging the Kim family to send troops for assistance, and they are still bragging"
"Now they believe in the United States again"
"If they are the world's number one, why haven't they defeated the world's number eight after more than two years of fighting?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A university in Shanghai notified that students should not wear strange costumes/cosplay on campus during Halloween, otherwise they will be registered by the police. 
It also stated that two students have already been registered by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 28, it was reported that Ukraine arrested a UN worker who was spying for Russia.
The 34-year-old UN worker was arrested. He monitored the location of Ukrainian positions in the direction of Pokrovsk and sent the location coordinates to the Russian army.
The Russian army planned to use the information provided by the spy to launch an attack on Pokrovsk using drones and missiles. According to Article 111 of the Ukrainian Criminal Code, he may be sentenced to life imprisonment.
